procedure.description: Create a AppHarbor configuration

formalParameter.description: The Configuration Name.
API token

procedure.description: Delete a AppHarbor configuration

formalParameter.description: Configuration name.

procedure.description: Allows the user to create a Configuration with the valid token, by providing the username and password.

formalParameter.description: Provide a name for the configuration to be created.
The valid username for the AppHarbor account.
The valid password for the AppHarbor account.

procedure.description: Allows to list all applications associated with the authorized AppHarbor account, or just one specific application.

formalParameter.description: Select the action to perform, the options are: List All and Get application detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.

procedure.description: Allows to create an AppHarbor application.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the name for the app to create.
Select the region identifier, the options are: amazon-web-services::us-east-1 or amazon-web-services::eu-west-1.

procedure.description: Allows to edit an existing AppHarbor application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
Specifies the new name for the app.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.

procedure.description: Allows to remove an existing AppHarbor application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.

procedure.description: Allows to retrieve information about the unhandled exception logs for an application.

formalParameter.description: Select the action to perform, the options are: List Error Logs and Get Error Detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The Error identifier.

procedure.description: Allows to retrieve information about the collaborators for an application.

formalParameter.description: Select the action to perform, the options are: List Collaborators and Get Collaborator Detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the collaborator identifier.

procedure.description: Allows to create a collaborator for an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The email address of the collaborator to add.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The access level for the collaborator. Accepted values are collaborator or administrator.

procedure.description: Allows to edit an existing collaborator for an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
Specifies the collaborator identifier.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The access level for the collaborator. Accepted values are collaborator or administrator.

procedure.description: Allows to remove an existing collaborator from an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
Specifies the collaborator identifier.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.

procedure.description: Allows to retrieve information about the user-created environment settings for an application. The options are: List Configuration Variables and Get Configuration Variable Detail.

formalParameter.description: Select the action to perform, the options are: List Configuration Variables and Get Configuration Variable Detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the configuration variable identifier.

procedure.description: Allows to create a configuration variable for an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration variable.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The value to assign to the configuration variable.

procedure.description: Allows to edit a configuration variable for an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration variable.
The configuration variable identifier.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The value to assign to the configuration variable.

procedure.description: Allows to remove a configuration variable from an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the configuration variable identifier.

procedure.description: Allows to retrieve information about the host names of an application. The options are: List Hostnames and Get Hostname Detail.

formalParameter.description: Select the action to perform, the options are: List Hostnames and Get Hostname Detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The Hostname identifier.

procedure.description: Allow the user to create a custom host name and associate it with an application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the new Hostname, e.g. "example.org".

procedure.description: Allow the user to delete a host name from a given application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies hostname to remove.

procedure.description: Used to view and remove the service hooks associated with an AppHarbor application.

formalParameter.description: Select the action to perform, the options are: List Service Hooks and Get Service Hook Detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the Service Hook identifier.

procedure.description: Allow the user to create service hooks and associate them with an AppHarbor application.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Provide a new URL, e.g. "http://www.example.org".

procedure.description: Allow the user to remove service hooks.

formalParameter.description: The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Specifies the Service Hook identifier.

procedure.description: Allow the user to retrieve information about the build history for an application. This procedure will permit the viewing the test history associated with the authorized AppHarbor account.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
Select the action to perform, the options are: List Build History, Get Build Detail, List Tests and Get Test Detail.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
Specifies the build identifier.
The Test identifier.

procedure.description: Allow the user to deploy an application.

formalParameter.description: The name of the configuration that contains the information to connect with AppHarbor.
The globally unique, URL-friendly version of the application name.
Specifies the build identifier.
